request.description:
## Register a new user

Required fields:

- email (must be unique)
- name
- password (more than 6 characters)

response.name: Short password

request.description:
## User login

Required fields:

- email
- password

## Get user profile

Provide Authorization Token in request header

## Update user profile

Provide Authorization Token in request header

## List all singers

No Authorization required.

response.name: Success

request.description:
## Retrieve singer by ID

No authorization needed.

request.description:
## Create a new singer

Provide Authorization Token in request header
Only Admin can create singer.

## Update singer details

Provide Authorization Token in request header
Only Admin can update singer.
